mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS id, b.item_name AS itemName, b.quantity AS quantity, b.scale AS scale, CAST(b.quantity / b.headcnt AS SIGNED INTEGER) AS each_quantity, CAST(b.total_price / b.headcnt AS SIGNED INTEGER) AS each_price, b.meeting_location AS meetingLocation, b.headcnt AS headcnt, b.headcnt - b.remain_headcnt AS participantsHeadcnt, c.content AS category, b.is_finished AS isFinished, 1 AS isScraped, b.item_image1 FROM scraps s JOIN boards b ON s.board_id = b.id JOIN board_categories c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE s.user_id = #{uid}
